originalText.text: We are so happy that our daughter is at The Pouch! She is thriving- She is starting to speak in Spanish as well as English. She loves her teachers and she is happy there. One could really feel the love and care from every teacher there. Children often visit the local library and they have music class organized at The Pouch. After I pick her up, I get the report with her photos and videos on the app. But the best thing about The Pouch is that they cook organic food for the children- 3 meals a day!!! I am recommending this amazing place to any parent looking for a daycare.

originalText.text: We spent a Tuesday morning at Montessori Pouch and enjoyed it so much. The space is bright and lovely; and the instructors were sweet and so good with the children. The toys and set up were true to Montessori, and Mariana, the founder, showed us the Montessori curriculum books and materials used.  We were just doing research for 6 months from now, but were very tempted to start right away. When we are ready, we are definitely going to return to The Pouch.
